column4: evolution question: In debian on evolution 2.0.2 when I compose a letter and type in the to: field names are auto completed for however in ubuntu (warty or hoary) this is not working. Any clues?
are the names in your address book?
did you enable autocompletion in your preferences?
oh how silly, missed that one
Must have come across automatically in debian on upgrade. My mother was asking about this when I upgraded her to ubuntu but I couldn't find it.  Thanks V much
waiting for headers -> network trouble
yes but only on those packages other packages from same pool seem okay
are you using a proxy?
no
well my provider might be
When I try thorugh firefox it works okay
downloading deb now
but doesn't fixfox 0.9 have a security hole?
those have been patched in the ubuntu version
cool
firefox about: version 1.0 on my box?
repeat in English?
oops you said warty
yes, that works. but you can't have warty and firefox 1.0
does ubuntu support apt-get -t option?
yes, but you don't want to mix hoary and warty
good question :)
